name: Rough Country
description:
Your base is under attack by the evil blue team, and it is your job to fend off a large amount of deployed units.

Do you have what it takes to beat all 15 waves?

All controls and instructions are inside the "Help" section of the game from the title screen.

This was my grade 10 Info-Tech game, then updated to 1.1 during the following summer which added an option to play with a second player.

I plan on eventually updating the game with better UI, a 3rd player, XBOX controller support, and perhaps a new game mode.
